description: Hoylu AB engages in the product management and software development activities in Europe and EMEA. The company is headquartered in Malmo, Skane and currently employs 36 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2017-02-20. The firm operates as a provider of software solutions for employee collaboration combined with input and display technologies, such as flat panels, interactive walls, virtual and augmented glasses, among others. The firm combines its own software for collaboration with hardware and software from its suppliers into a solution for presentation, communication and interactive collaboration that includes touch tables and touch panels with pen support and virtual reality. The firm offers various solutions, namely Creative Collaboration, Remote Collaboration, Immersive Presentation, among others.
name: Hoylu AB
